short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to add 2x speed button and set keys for toggling 2x speed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a 2x speed toggle button within youtube and also links it to a changeable key on your keyboard (default set to "d"). Click on the extension for a popup to set your desired key!
